title: 请大佬再帮忙（ps已附上崩溃报告）
author: arbotos
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----

WARNING: coremods are present:
  DLFMLCorePlugin ([移动光源]DynamicLights-1.12.2.jar)
  CustomSkinLoader ([万用皮肤补丁]CustomSkinLoader_Forge-14.10a.jar)

  Inventory Tweaks Coremod ([R键整理]InventoryTweaks-1.63.jar)
  AppleCore ([苹果核-调味料前置]AppleCore-mc1.12.2-3.2.0.jar)
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

// Hey, that tickles! Hehehe!

Time: 1/25/20 8:39 PM
